meanings.definition: A unit of magnetic flux density equal to one billionth of a tesla.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use nanoteslas to study tiny magnetic fields.
meanings.sent2: The device can detect even the smallest changes in nanoteslas.
meanings.sent3: The magnet was so weak, it only measured a few nanoteslas!
meanings.sent4: Her magnetic personality was like a million nanoteslas pulling me in.
meanings.sent5: The nanoteslas danced on the screen, showing the magnetic activity.

meanings.definition: The nanotesla is commonly used to measure the strength of magnetic fields.
meanings.sent1: Measuring in nanoteslas helps determine magnetic field intensity.
meanings.sent2: The instrument displayed readings in nanoteslas for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the magnet, causing chaos in nanoteslas!
meanings.sent4: The magnetic field was a web of nanoteslas connecting everything.
meanings.sent5: The nanoteslas hummed softly, revealing the hidden magnetic forces.
